cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoru

sentence.kanji: きのうの夜は家にいました。
sentence.romaji: kinou no yoru ha ie ni imashita
sentence.english: I was at home last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toshi

sentence.kanji: 新しい年が始まりました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii toshi ga hajimarimashita
sentence.english: A new year has started.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyonen

sentence.kanji: 私は去年フランスへ行った。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kyonen furansu he ita
sentence.english: I went to France last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shounen

sentence.kanji: 少年たちがサッカーをしている。
sentence.romaji: shounentachi ga saka- wo shite iru
sentence.english: The boys are playing soccer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yonaka

sentence.kanji: 夜中に電話がありました。
sentence.romaji: yonaka ni denwa ga arimashita
sentence.english: I got a telephone call in the middle of the night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maitoshi

sentence.kanji: 私は毎年、海外旅行に行きます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha maitoshi kaigai ryokou ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I travel abroad every year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niteiru

sentence.kanji: 私は母に似ています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha haha ni nite imasu
sentence.english: I look like my mother.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toshiue

sentence.kanji: 彼は私より年上です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha watashi yori toshiue desu
sentence.english: He's older than me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ijou

sentence.kanji: 飛行機が1時間以上遅れた。
sentence.romaji: hikouki ga ichijikan ijou okureta
sentence.english: The plane arrived over an hour late.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mainen

sentence.kanji: 毎年給料が上がる。
sentence.romaji: mainen kyuuryou ga agaru
sentence.english: My salary goes up every year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaeru

sentence.kanji: 車のタイヤを換えた。
sentence.romaji: kuruma no taiya wo kaeta
sentence.english: I changed the tires on the car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toshiyori

sentence.kanji: あの村にはお年寄りがたくさん住んでいます。
sentence.romaji: ano mura ni ha otoshiyori ga takusan sunde imasu
sentence.english: A lot of elderly people live in that village.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toshishita

sentence.kanji: 彼は奥さんより年下です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha okusan yori toshishita desu
sentence.english: He's younger than his wife.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mannenhitsu

sentence.kanji: 父に万年筆をプレゼントしました。
sentence.romaji: chichi ni mannenhitsu wo purezento shimashita
sentence.english: I gave my father a fountain pen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nengajou

sentence.kanji: 昨日、年賀状を出しました。
sentence.romaji: kinou nengajou wo dashimashita
sentence.english: I sent my New Year cards yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bin

sentence.kanji: 瓶ビールを注文した。
sentence.romaji: binbi-ru wo chuumon shita
sentence.english: I ordered a bottle of beer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yo

sentence.kanji: あと1時間で夜が明けますね。
sentence.romaji: ato 1 jikan de yo ga akemasu ne
sentence.english: It will be dawn in another hour.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bounenkai

sentence.kanji: 明日は会社の忘年会があります。
sentence.romaji: ashita ha kaisha no bounenkai ga arimasu
sentence.english: The company will have a year-end party tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toshitsuki

sentence.kanji: あれから長い年月が経ちました。
sentence.romaji: are kara nagai toshitsuki ga tachimashita
sentence.english: A long time has passed since then.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenmatsu

sentence.kanji: 年末のセールはいつも込んでいるね。
sentence.romaji: nenmatsu no se-ru ha itsumo konde iru ne
sentence.english: The year-end sale is always crowded.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yofukashi

sentence.kanji: 最近の子供たちは夜更かしです。
sentence.romaji: saikin no kodomo tachi ha yofukashi desu
sentence.english: These days children stay up till late.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nennen

sentence.kanji: 東京の人口は年々増えています。
sentence.romaji: toukyou no jinkou ha nennen fuete imasu
sentence.english: The population of Tokyo increases year by year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's unei

sentence.kanji: その事業は国が運営しています。
sentence.romaji: sono jigyou ha kuni ga unei shite imasu
sentence.english: The project is operated by the government.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoake

sentence.kanji: 夜明けと共に目が覚めたんだ。
sentence.romaji: yoake to tomo ni me ga sameta n da
sentence.english: I awoke at daybreak.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niru

sentence.kanji: 女の子は話し方まで母親に似るわね。
sentence.romaji: onna no ko ha hanashikata made hahaoya ni niru wa ne
sentence.english: The girl even talks like her mother.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's izen

sentence.kanji: 以前彼はこの町に住んでいたんだ。
sentence.romaji: izen kare ha kono machi ni sunde ita n da
sentence.english: He used to live in this town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakunen

sentence.kanji: 彼は私より一学年上です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha watashi yori hito gakunen ue desu
sentence.english: He's one year above me in school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nendai

sentence.kanji: 私と彼は同じ年代です。
sentence.romaji: watashi to kare ha onaji nendai desu
sentence.english: He and I are the same generation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mayonaka

sentence.kanji: 彼は真夜中に帰ってきたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mayonaka ni kaete kita no
sentence.english: He came back at midnight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niau

sentence.kanji: 彼女は着物がよく似合います。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kimono ga yoku niaimasu
sentence.english: Kimonos suit her well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niseru

sentence.kanji: 彼の字に似せて書きました。
sentence.romaji: kare no ji ni nisete kakimashita
sentence.english: I wrote it by imitating his handwriting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ika

sentence.kanji: 数学が平均点以下だった。
sentence.romaji: suugaku ga heikinten ika data
sentence.english: The math score was below average.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miseinen

sentence.kanji: 未成年はお酒を飲めません。
sentence.romaji: miseinen ha osake wo nomemasen
sentence.english: Minors can't drink alcohol.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honnen

sentence.kanji: 会社の本年の目標が発表されたよ。
sentence.romaji: kaisha no honnen no mokuhyou ga hapyou sareta yo
sentence.english: The company's goal this year was announced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zennen

sentence.kanji: 前年に比べて利益が上がりました。
sentence.romaji: zennen ni kurabete rieki ga agarimashita
sentence.english: Profits went up compared with the previous year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nengetsu

sentence.kanji: そのお寺は長い年月をかけて建てられた。
sentence.romaji: sono otera ha nagai nengetsu wo kakete taterareta
sentence.english: The temple was built over the course of many years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reinen

sentence.kanji: 例年8月は雨が少ないね。
sentence.romaji: reinen 8 gatsu ha ame ga sukunai ne
sentence.english: There's little rain in a typical August.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は金融関係の会社で働いています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kinyuu kankei no kaisha de hataraite imasu
sentence.english: He works at a financial company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukiyo

sentence.kanji: 散歩にいい月夜ですね。
sentence.romaji: sanpo ni ii tsukiyo desu ne
sentence.english: It's a good moonlit night for a stroll.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iikaeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は易しい言葉に言い換えたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yasashii kotoba ni iikaeta n da
sentence.english: He paraphrased it in easy language.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eki

sentence.kanji: 容器から液がこぼれていますよ。
sentence.romaji: youki kara eki ga koborete imasu yo
sentence.english: The liquid is spilling from the container.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuunen

sentence.kanji: これは、中年の男性によく見られる症状です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha chuunen no dansei ni yoku mirareru shoujou desu
sentence.english: These symptoms are often seen in middle-aged men.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tetsuya

sentence.kanji: ゆうべは徹夜しました。
sentence.romaji: yuube ha tetsuya shimashita
sentence.english: I stayed up all last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nengapi

sentence.kanji: 申請の年月日を西暦で書いてください。
sentence.romaji: shinsei no nengapi wo seireki de kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write down the application date in the Western calendar.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seinen

sentence.kanji: 成年になると独立した戸籍を作れます。
sentence.romaji: seinen ni naru to dokuritsu shita koseki wo tsukuremasu
sentence.english: An individual family register can be made when you become an adult.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokunen

sentence.kanji: 彼女は大学卒業の翌年に結婚したの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha daigaku sotsugyou no yokunen ni kekon shita no
sentence.english: She married the year after graduating from university.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teinen

sentence.kanji: 彼は来年定年を迎える。
sentence.romaji: kare ha rainen teinen wo mukaeru
sentence.english: He will retire next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ekitai

sentence.kanji: 洗濯に液体の洗剤を使っています。
sentence.romaji: sentaku ni ekitai no senzai wo tsukate imasu
sentence.english: I use liquid detergent for washing clothes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenjuu

sentence.kanji: 叔母は年中旅行しています。
sentence.romaji: oba ha nenjuu ryokou shite imasu
sentence.english: My aunt travels all year round.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaizen

sentence.kanji: 彼は食生活を改善しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shokuseikatsu wo kaizen shimashita
sentence.english: He has improved his eating habits.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenga

sentence.kanji: 年賀葉書が売り出されたね。
sentence.romaji: nengahagaki ga uridasareta ne
sentence.english: New Year's greeting cards are now on sale.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenshi

sentence.kanji: 部下の方が年始の挨拶に見えましたよ。
sentence.romaji: buka no kata ga nenshi no aisatsu ni miemashita yo
sentence.english: Your men came to give greetings for the new year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kahei

sentence.kanji: 博物館で昔の貨幣を見ました。
sentence.romaji: hakubutsukan de mukashi no kahei wo mimashita
sentence.english: I saw some old money in the museum.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kabin

sentence.kanji: クリスタルガラスの花瓶を買いました。
sentence.romaji: kurisutarugarasu no kabin wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a crystal glass vase.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otoshidama

sentence.kanji: 甥と姪にお年玉をあげたの。
sentence.romaji: oi to mei ni otoshidama wo ageta no
sentence.english: I gave New Year's pocket money to my niece and nephew.
